data.actual_result: Mute and "all notifications" are both checked
data.expected_result: Mute won't be mark in the same time "all notifications" does
data.short_description: Notification settings for specific channel behaves different than it should be when you assign "all notifications" and mute from right clicking the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server notifications settings  - Add a channel to notifications overrides- Click on "all"- Go to the server- Right click same channel- Press mute- Go to servers notifications again
